content: create this heavy-weight quilt-like crochet blanket with just one simple stitch and simple seaming techniques free video tutorial 1 this pattern includes clear step-by-step photo tutorials for the advanced techniques basic skills required chain half_double_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round pattern level easy written in us standard terms materials - worsted weight yarn scraps roughly 15-20yds per square plus yarn for seaming - 5 0mm hook or hook to meet gauge - stuffing yarn needle scissors measuring tape finished item measurements - any desired size mine measures 54 x 54 tech edited this item has been tech edited to ensure quality please message me if you have any questions about the pattern you can also reach out on instagram @sass and stitch please do not alter rewrite share or sell this pattern in any way do not use my photographs without my consent you may sell finished products that you made with this pattern please give credit in any listing of finished products or in any social media post 1 https //youtu be/ulmfik9syhg
